name: True Colors (itch) (Just JDep)
description:
(Check out the first image for more details) 

Use A and D keys to move left and right and use SPACE to jump and double jump.  Also,  you can keep jumping while against a wall to move up it  and if you get stuck, click R to respawn.

You start the game unable to see colors and must touch the buttons to see the level’s platforms and hazard. The Happy face will chase you until he touches you at which point the colors will vanish. 

*you can also use a controller (recommended)
